description:
My place is close to subway station and close to many good dinning places. You’ll love my place because of the views, the location, and the outdoors space. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and furry friends (pets).

The subway 7 is just 3 mins from my apartment. It is really easy to get into Manhattan.
name: Bright Manhattan view studio
